Setting.Name: Word to Spell (leave this empty if random)

Comment.Text: You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1

Overview This scenario can be used online once the classifiers is trained. The Target Letter Generation box still proposes some targets in order to eventually train the classifier again, but you may want to disconnect that box in order to have a real free time use of the speller. The flash sequence starts automatically after 20 sec. You will then be presented a blue letter that you have to focus on, followed by a 12 times flashing sequence of the whole grid. The detected letter will be presented in green. This will be repeated 10 times. If the performance of the system does not fit your requirements, just run 2-train-classifier scenario again on the data you just recorded. note: the recorded files go to the folder where the scenario xml is located (${Player_ScenarioDirectory}/).
